My satisfaction
Aperture Science:
We do what we must
Because we can
For the good of all of us
Except the ones who are dead
But there's no sense crying
Over every mistake

To help you?

Anyway this cake is great
It's so delicious and moist

When I look out there,
It makes me GLaD I'm not you
I've experiments to run
There is research to be done
On the people who are
Still alive
And believe me I am
Still alive
I'm doing science and I'm
Still alive
I feel fantastic and I'm
Still alive
While you're dying I'll be
Still alive
And when you're dead I will be
Still alive

Epic game yes portal cool me go yes
played it on xbox 360 years ago and playing it again brought back so much nostalgia. I love this game and it is still good.

This is the best puzzle game I have ever played the story is amazing and I loved every bit of it.  I can admit the gameplay seems a bit boring but once you complete more puzzles it gets interesting and fun all at the same time. The music in the game is good, but overall game just makes you use your brain.
I would recommend to play this game 10/10

While this game came out over 10 years ago, it holds up tremendously! The visuals are stunning, the music fits perfectly with the game, the gameplay is so fun, the writing is phenomenal! The only problem with the game is the constant loading screens, but other than that, this game is flawless. 10/10, will keep playing this game for years to come. Now, lets get back to testing lol.
